      • addEvent

        void addEvent(Event event,
              Person associatedPerson)
       throws EventAlreadyExistsException
        adds an event to a person
        Parameters:
        event - the event to add to that person within the database
        associatedPerson - the person whose event it is
        Throws:
        EventAlreadyExistsException - when the passed event already exists associated with the passed person

      • deleteEvent

        void deleteEvent(Event event,
                 Person person)
          throws EventNotFoundException
        removes an event from the database from the given person
        Parameters:
        event - the event to delete from the database
        person - the person whose event is to be removed
        Throws:
        EventNotFoundException - when the passed event does not exist in the database

      • eventExists

        boolean eventExists(Event event)
        checks whether the given event is in the database
        Parameters:
        event - the event to check against the database
        Returns:
        true or false whether the event is in the database or not

      • getEvent

        Event getEvent(java.lang.String eventID)
        throws EventNotFoundException
        gets the event by using the eventID
        Parameters:
        eventID - the string identification for the event to return
        Returns:
        the event with the passed eventID
        Throws:
        EventNotFoundException - when the passed eventID does not exist in the database

      • getEvents

        java.util.ArrayList<Event> getEvents(Person person)
                              throws PersonNotFoundException
        returns all events of the given person
        Parameters:
        person - the person whose events will be returned
        Returns:
        the arraylist of all events recorded in the database for the given person
        Throws:
        PersonNotFoundException - when the passed person does not exist within the database
